mapper.insert: INSERT INTO grouptask_submit ( grouptask_id, group_id, submit_desc, submit_file_id, submit_at ) VALUES ( #{grouptaskId}, #{groupId}, #{submitDesc}, #{submitFileId}, #{submitAt} )
mapper.select: SELECT grouptask_id, group_id, submit_desc, submit_file_id, submit_at FROM grouptask_submit ORDER BY grouptask_id, group_id
mapper.update: UPDATE grouptask_submit SET submit_desc = #{submitDesc}, submit_file_id = #{submitFileId}, submit_at = #{submitAt} WHERE grouptask_id = #{grouptaskId} AND group_id = #{groupId}
